sys_atf_test.description: Test two NeedIt App Client Scripts: NeedIt Set Requested for, NeedIt Populate Email Field Test generated from template. To complete this test do the following: 1. Pick a correct user to impersonate, a user with the right roles. 2. Opens a new form for a table. 3. Edit the Set Field Values step to supply values for all fields that need them. 4. Edit the mandatory, non mandatory, read only, non read only, visible and non visible fields. 5. Submits the current form.
sys_atf_test.name: NeedIt Set Requested for and Email
sys_atf_test.sys_name: NeedIt Set Requested for and Email
